trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en kontroll primitiv som hanterar placering och storlek för en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> kontroll och två <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> kontroller som används för att ange en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Spåra kontrollen har inte standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: Dess <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>implementeras som en del av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: Spårningen har en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>kontroll och två <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontroller som används för att ändra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>egenskapen spåra kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: Följande bild visar ett spår på en skjutreglaget.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **Reda på ett skjutreglage**![RepeatButton, USB](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, USB") i följande tabell visas spåra egenskaper och motsvarande <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>Egenskaper som de binds automatiskt att.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: När någon av egenskaperna ändras, ändras också egenskapen bundna.

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Spåra egenskapen | Egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| I följande tabell visas spåra egenskaper och motsvarande <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Egenskaper som de bindas när ett spår är en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontroll och egenskaper för spåra inte uttryckligen anges.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Spåra egenskapen | Egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| I följande tabell visas spåra egenskaper och motsvarande <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>Egenskaper som de bindas när ett spår är en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll och egenskaper för spåra inte uttryckligen anges.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: | Spåra egenskapen | Egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Dessutom den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Egenskaper för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontroller för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll bind med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Egenskaper för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>kontroller i kontrollen spåra.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: När ett spår för att rulla innehållet, storleken på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>kontrollen är proportionell mot procentandelen av det innehåll som visas i ett visningsområde eller visningsområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: Följande bild visar ett exempel på en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll som implementerar en spåra kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **En rullningslist som har en kontroll för spåra**![rullningslisten illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "rullningslisten illlustration") följande beräkning som används för att beräkna storleken på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLength parametern viewportSize är värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Högsta och lägsta parametrar motsvarar de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>egenskapsvärden.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för maximal uttrycket – minsta + viewportSize är storleken på det rullningsbara innehållet.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Observera att värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>egenskapen representerar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>för Track när innehållet bläddras längst ned.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Detta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>värde är inte samma som längd eller omfattningen av innehållet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En mer detaljerad förklaring finns <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>På spår i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>ökar uppifrån och ned eller från vänster till höger beroende på riktning i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: På liknande sätt den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>på spår i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>ökar nedifrån och upp eller från vänster till höger beroende på riktning i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ange för att ändra riktning för att öka värdet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>egenskap för Track till `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar layout för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det område som har angetts för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> ska användas för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> innehåll.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som minskar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>egenskapen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: När en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen är i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>styra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Egenskaper för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>styr av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>binda till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som minskar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> styr när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> trycks.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> kontroll som har standardinställningar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar underordnat medlemmen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du anger de underordnade elementen i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: De underordnade elementen indexeras i den ordning som egenskaperna.

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: Indexet för underordnat.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar objekt av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> med det angivna indexet i listan över visual underordnade element.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: Indexet måste vara ett tal mellan noll (0) och värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>egenskapen minus en (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: Det angivna indexet är större än värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>egenskapen minus en (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som ökar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>egenskapen för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> klass</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: När en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen är i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>styra den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>Egenskaper för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>styr av den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>binda till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> som ökar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> styr när den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> trycks.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> kontroll som har standardinställningar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger om riktningen för att öka <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>återförs från standardriktningen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: När värdet för IsDirectionReversed anges till `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>exchange-platser.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>värden ökar från vänster till höger för både vågräta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Men den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>värden för en lodrät <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>öka uppifrån och ned, medan lodrätt <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>dessa värden ökar nedifrån och upp.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: När du anger egenskapen IsDirectionReversed till `true`, ångrar riktningen för värdet.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du implementerar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>som en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll- och du inte uttryckligen anger egenskapen IsDirectionReversed, IsDirectionReversed egenskap Binder till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <> </> *> och <> </> *> utbyts positioner och riktning för att öka värdet är inverterad, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifieraren för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det maximala antalet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: När en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen är i ett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>kontroll och egenskapen maximalt inte uttryckligen har angett, denna egenskap Binder automatiskt med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Det maximala värdet för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontroll motsvarar storleken på det rullningsbara innehållet minus storlek på synligt innehållsområde eller visningsområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: Om exempelvis storleken på innehållet är 100 och storleken på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>egenskapen är 30 är värdet på egenskapen maximalt 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Detta är SANT eftersom den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontroll motsvarar position i det rullningsbara innehåll som visas överst i visningsområdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: När innehållet är rullas till längst ned i det här exemplet visas fortfarande 30 procent av innehållet i visningsområdet.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Därför kan den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>som motsvarar upp i visningsområdet är 70 och maxvärdet är 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: I följande illustration visas hur <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>motsvarar en position i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||

trans-unit.target: Om du implementerar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>som en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontroll och du inte uttryckligen ange egenskapen Orientation orientering egenskap Binder till <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> kontroll som har standardinställningar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> as determined by the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> control.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Value property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: När en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen tillhör en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>kontroll- och värdet för egenskapen inte uttryckligen har angett den här egenskapen automatiskt Binder med den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det aktuella värdet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är 0.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> moves.
trans-unit.target: Beräknar ändringen i den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> när den <> </> *> flyttas.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: Den vågräta förskjutningen i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: Den lodräta förskjutningen i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The change in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> that corresponds to the displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ändring i <> </> *> som motsvarar förskjutningen av den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> to a specified point along the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Beräknar avståndet från den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> till en angiven längs den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: Den angivna punkten.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the and the specified pt value.
trans-unit.target: Avståndet mellan den och det angivna pt värde.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger storleken på del av det rullningsbara innehåll som är synligt.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the ViewportSize is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Värdet på egenskapen ViewportSize används för att beräkna storleken på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>kontroll i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>när ViewportSize är inte <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i Anmärkningar för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ange storleken på den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>Skapa ett objekt som härleds från <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>klassen och ange åsidosättningar för <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du implementerar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>som en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>kontroll- och du inte uttryckligen anger egenskapen ViewportSize, ViewportSize egenskap Binder till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för egenskapen ViewportSize för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kontrollen som är implementerad i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>kontrollen är alltid <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, eftersom den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>kontrollen ändrar inte storlek.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`||

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Storleken på det synliga området rullningsbara innehåll.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, vilket innebär att innehållets storlek inte har definierats.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifieraren för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar antalet underordnade element för en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du anger de underordnade elementen i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: De underordnade elementen indexeras i den ordning som egenskaperna.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ett heltal mellan 0 och 2 som anger antalet underordnade element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.
